materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a cluster of nutmeg fruits on a branch. There are three fruits that have split open, showing the nutmeg seed inside. There is a smaller unripe nutmeg in the center of the photograph. There are a handful of leaves that are still attached to the branch. The edges of the photograph are rounded. The title is written at the bottom-right, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Nutmeg, Java
